content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} I would re-world the actual question:

Suppose you have X2 \(or better real Clearpath Jackal\) with IMU mounted and that you control it via ROS. It is stand still and you send command go 1m/s and after few seconds you send command 0m/s … what reading would you expect on IMU/accelerometer?

‌
